attributes.action: SACK HEAD OF SOCIAL SERVICES AT HARINGAY COUNCIL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I BELIVE THAT NO-ONE AT THIS COUNCIL IS UP TO TAKING RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE DEATH OF BABY P.  ANY NORMAL WORKING MAN OR WOMEN WOULD HAVE BEEN SACKED FOR NOT DOING THEIR DUTY.

ALL WE HEAR IS THAT LESSONS WILL BE LEARNED OR LET'S BE CLEAR, THESE ARE BUZZ WORDS WHICH ALL LABOUR MP'S SEEM TO USE. 

ARE LESSONS EVER LEARNED?

THIS IS A CHILDS LIFE,  LET'S FACE IT NO-ONE HAS BEEN ACCOUNTABLE FOR THIS DEATH.  

IT ALL SEEMS LIKE SOMEONE IS COVERING THEIR BACK.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/

Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
